column3: You're fired. Security footage caught you stealing.\nYour final paycheck is revoked. Don't bother using me as a reference.\nGood luck paying rent.
Hey brother! Win MEGA MONEY with our exclusive game!\nReal players are winning thousands daily!\nOnly 3 turns per day to keep it fair. Your lucky break is one click away!
Your account has been TERMINATED due to repeated overdrafts.\nAll remaining assets have been seized to cover outstanding fees.\nYour credit score has been severely impacted.
